Name: Spartan Commander Realtime
About the game: You hold the fate of Sparta in your hands. Stand as a humble Hoplite and earn your way through the ranks as you become King of Sparta and all of Greece. Change the fate of History as you fight against Xerxes oncoming hordes and fight to win the day! Should you defeat Xerxes you will leave a lasting legacy that will change the history books for all time. REWRITE HISTORY! Fight on the passes of Thermopolaye. With hundreds of Spartans and Hundreds of Persians on the field at any time. Features --Earn XP with each kill to unlock higher ranks such as Sergeant, Lieutenant, Major and King --Earn XP for each battle won --Pickup weapons and food, drink water to stay alive. --Customize weapon selection, shield selection and spear selection --Build fires and chop trees to collect wood Gameplay --Give commands to your soldiers to form circle formation, lines, attack etc --Play on three separate rounds on the map of thermopolaye --Fight against waves of soldiers --Attack, defend using shield spear and sword
